backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining shop and clothing item types, search/filter logic, item detail lookup, photo blob storage, and shop initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing requirements for adding a static clothing photo and matching backend seed data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for category selection, search, and results.
frontend/src/components/aura/AppLayout.t: Root layout with header, footer, and auto backend shop initialization on mount.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemCard.ts: Card UI for displaying a clothing item with photo handling, metadata, price, and shop availability count.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemDetailD: Modal dialog showing detailed item info, shop list, and a photo upload workflow with live preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuraQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing categories, searching items, fetching item details, counting shop appearances, and uploading item photos via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, and logout handlers.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines light and dark theme color variables along with base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CategorySelectionPage: Displays available categories with icons and navigates to the search page when a category is selected.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Runs item searches based on filters, shows results or errors, and allows viewing item details or returning to search.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides inputs for item type, color, and pattern, and navigates to results using the selected filters.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Normalizes image paths by cleaning input and ensuring consistent leading slashes or URL formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
